ngx-portfolio:.title: I’m Ernesto Pérez
ngx-portfolio:.subTitle: I design and build digital experiences here you can find my recent projects and all my information
ngx-portfolio:.aboutMeText: I’m a user interface and user experience designer, product designer, and front-end developer. I design and build responsive websites and products; I also design apps and systems. My focus is on products and services that honor their user's humanity and help improve our world. I'm also crazy about typography, dogs, and coffee.
ngx-portfolio:.worksCopy: Works A select group of projects completed 2016/2017

proyectos.descripcionProyecto: To scale and impact, we must stand up compelling effective altruism collaborative consumption thought provoking. The collaborative cities, radical; relief, strengthening infrastructure.
proyectos.copyProyecto: The Timer App is an iOS app design to be the cleanest and most simple timer app ever created. Stop, start and time yourself.
